document_data.name: Spirit Worm
document_data.mainbody: '''''Spirit worm''''' was a [[necromancy]] [[spell]] used by [[wizard]]s and [[sorcerer]]s.
document_data.Effects: This spell created a persistent decay in both the body and spirt of the target. This effect manifested as either a small amount of physical harm or a slight weakening of the target's overall constitution.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic]] components, this spell required a piece of fire-blackened [[ivory]] or bone carved in the shape of a [[worm]] to cast.
